gui.panels
Class PanelTargetText

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gui.panels.PanelTargetText
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentOperations, EMail, ListenerGUIState, ListenerTextEditable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ListenerAddresseeChanged, ListenerAddresserChanged
public class PanelTargetText
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ListenerAddresseeChanged, ListenerAddresserChanged, ListenerTextEditable, ListenerGUIState, DocumentOperations, EMail

Class for the panel which contains the components for the target text. The components on the panel differ from the document type. For this there are inner classes which match the document type.

Author:
Antje Huber
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

build

private void build()
This method builds a part of the components on the panel, decides which status will be used and creates an object of class DocumentBuilder. The other parts of the components will be created depending on the status (call inner.build()).

addCommons

private void addCommons()
Adds the always added components for textArea and buttons.
